item.title: CVE-2023-47551|2023-11-18T21:50:45.264Z -- rednao -- donations%20made%20easy%20%E2%80%93%20smart%20donations
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in RedNao Donations Made Easy – Smart Donations.This issue affects Donations Made Easy – Smart Donations: from n/a through 4.0.12.

item.description: Unauth. Reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in RedNao Donations Made Easy – Smart Donations plugin <= 4.0.12 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-46076|2023-10-26T12:05:36.441Z -- rednao -- woocommerce%20pdf%20invoice%20builder%2C%20create%20invoices%2C%20packing%20slips%20and%20more

item.title: CVE-2023-40207|2023-11-06T08:00:09.182Z -- rednao -- donations%20made%20easy%20%E2%80%93%20smart%20donations
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in RedNao Donations Made Easy – Smart Donations allows SQL Injection.This issue affects Donations Made Easy – Smart Donations: from n/a through 4.0.12.

item.title: CVE-2024-29820|2024-03-27T06:54:37.016Z -- rednao -- pdf%20builder%20for%20wpforms

item.title: CVE-2024-31940|2024-04-15T09:15:47.045Z -- rednao -- extra%20product%20options%20builder%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in RedNao Extra Product Options Builder for WooCommerce.This issue affects Extra Product Options Builder for WooCommerce: from n/a through 1.2.104.
